Name: Dungeons & Guns
About the game: Dungeons & Guns is a pixel art visual, dungeon crawler style game, where the player aims to advance as far as possible through the enemy crowded dungeons, until reaching the final challenge. After this, new challenges will arise. The project first phase is now available and as the development continues, you will be constantly updated about the game expansion process, until its final release. Features 30+ enemies; 02 bosses; 15 weapons; 15 items; 02 dungeon themes; Store room; Weapon chest room; Replayability (procedurally generated dungeons); Lightning System. Controls Movements: W A S D; Dash: Space; Shoot: Left mouse button; Reload: R; Change weapon: Tab; Interact: E; Open/close mini-map: M; Pause: Esc.
Meta Title: Dungeons & Guns: Jul 24, 2020, Juan Collin and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Dungeons & Guns? Check out the release date (Jul 24, 2020), developer insights from Juan Collin, and a complete game summary.
